Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: typical steps: post job ad, screen candidates, conduct interviews, make hiring decision, then if hired: onboarding employee, add to payroll, close case. sequential order: Post Screen Interview Decide Onboard Payroll Close

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Model1: StrictPartialOrder nodes Post Screen Decide Interview Onboard Payroll Close. Edges: PostScreen, ScreenDecide, ScreenInterview, DecideOnboard, OnboardPayroll, PayrollClose. partial order so parallelism: Screen leads to both Decide and Interview in any order

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: anomalies in Model1: Interview and Decide can be parallel after Screen; decision might be made before interviewing; model allows decision without interview; onboarding after decision without interview

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Model2 edges: Post Screen, Post Interview, Interview Decide, Decide loop_onboarding, loop_onboarding xor_payroll, xor_payroll Close. loop_onboarding LOOP Onboard skip; xor_payroll XOR Payroll skip

Name: Hypothesis Generation - NE
Text: anomalies Model2: screening can be omitted Post Interview Decide; loop_onboarding allows skipping onboarding entirely; XOR allows skipping payroll

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: both models have severe anomalies; Model1 lacks order between interview and decision; Model2 optional screening onboarding payroll

Name: Abductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Model1 enforces final steps Onboard Payroll Close mandatory after decision; Model2 allows omission of core steps via skip; Model1 closer to normative

Name: Validation - PE
Text: systematically list anomalies Model1: missing Interview before Decide severe; Model2: screening bypass severe, onboarding optional severe, payroll optional severe

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Model1 anomalies less severe ordering issues; Model2 more severe optionality of essential steps; conclude Model1 more normative
